snippet.title: Killer Bean - Slightly Extended Summer Game Fest 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1597080/Killer_Bean/
Console ports will be coming after it completes Early Access on Steam first.  For Playstation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch.  

From the same creator as Killer Bean Forever, this is a first person/third person, open-world, roguelike shooter.  Play as Killer Bean in his journey to take down the powerful Shadow Agency.  Every replay of a new campaign will be different.  

...
Killer Bean Forever:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qyYHWkVWQ4o
Music by Jeff Lew:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5usEA18fKSY
